divs: sighting detailsmy son and i were driving back home toward stillwater, mn. along hwy 95 which borders wisconsin and the st. croix river. at the time of the sighting we were in chisago county headed toward marine on the st. croix township. as i was driving i happened to noticed something eye-catching to my left across the road. there was a small house with a shed on a hill no more than 60-70 yards away. the sun had just gone down over the trees and it was getting hard to see rather quickly. i counted four big lights, hovering and wobbling, above the shed. the first thing that came to mind was that a helicopter was hovering above the shed but there was no sound (window was down) and the lights were way too big. the lights were flat and reminded me of flourescent panel lights because they did not shine a beam or anything like that. the lights were glowing and then as i drove on and looked back, they dimmed down and turned off-like someone deliberately didn't want to be seen. i did not see any disc or a solid shape above the lights but rather a dark image occupying space above the lights. i was more focused on the ackward hovering lights than anything at the time. i was also driving about 55 mph parallel to the site for under a minute. it was sudden, ackward, and by the time i adapted to the new paradigm, our car had passed the location rather quickly. my son was in the backseat right behind me and never said a word during the situation because he was experiencing the same scenario. he told me that he saw two giant round lights, a disc shaped craft that was greyish in color. he did not see four lights because he was more fixed on the shape and body while i was driving and focused mainly on the lights. either way, together, we have put together a mutual picture of our experience. it was just too dark to make out anything 100%. now, here is where the sighting gets more weird. we had a car about 50 yards behind us the whole time so i decided to find the nearest turnaround to head back to investigate what we saw since i had my video camera in the car. we were also very excited and curious. the next turnaround was approx 1\8 of a mile so we took a left and turned down a gravel country road to head back. we had to drive a while before finding a series of crossroads. the car that was behind us also turned down the same road. there were no other cars in the area so this was easy to determine. i then took a few right angle turns on various dirt roads to see if the car would continue behind us and it did. in fact, i couldn't ditch the car. it paced itself with us and matched every move. unfortunately, i was forced to leave the area out of fear that we were in danger so i headed back to the main road and sped to the nearest town about 10 miles away. the car finally turned off when we reached a populated area. the car was grey or silver and looked like a classic cop car from the 70's. at least that was my impression because it was dark and hard to see in the country. other things to note: we frequently travel this spot and there is nothing around the shed except for farm fields. there is no tower, windmill, silo, or any other buildings in the line of site of the shed for miles. there is just forest that reaches the st. croix river. my other thought is perhaps the car that followed us around wanted to speak with us to validate what he or she had seen as well. i did not feel safe to stop and chat with someone who mysteriously followed us around.
Summary: Greyish disc with cone shape on top
